snippet.title: Kyoryu - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ever wanted to run around a post-apocalyptic Japan where you, playing as a genetically reengineered dinosaur, are the apocalypse that eliminated humanity and is now the dominant species? Heck yeah you have! Kyoryu is a third-person action-adventure where you get to do just that, picking through the literal bones of humanity while battling rival dino factions. It's being developed by Floating Rock Studio, which is comprised of many ex-Weta folks. Enjoy this first gameplay trailer.

#IGN #Gaming
